news_header: Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi's visit to Washington to meet President Donald Trump will feature warm interactions and discussions on the US-India strategic partnership.
news_original_title: Trade, tariffs and visas to dominate Trump-Modi talks
news_text: Their relationship has grown through shared interests, particularly in countering China. Modi is expected to discuss trade, tariffs, energy, and technology, while also addressing the deportation of undocumented Indians. Both leaders aim to maintain a positive tone, despite potential sensitive topics, and the Quad alliance will be a focal point of their discussions.
